name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Work Suitable Tab Sort by Domain

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sort tabs by domain and thats it. Requires no extraneous permissions, which makes it more work suitable.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple extension built with the absolute minimum permissions needed so you can use it at work. Sort tabs by domain and that's it.
